Click the "bilibili" icon, opening the application.
Click the "home" button to navigate to the homepage.
Click on the video titled "【雷军】努力成为兼容苹果生态最好的手机".
Click the like button, represented by a thumb icon, to indicate approval of the displayed content.
Click the three dots icon to view more options.
Click on "勇敢逐少年啊快去创造热评~" to open the comment box.
Click the input field at the bottom to enter text.
